## VariableMap.getVariableById() method

Find the variable by the given ID and return it. Return null if not found.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getVariableById(id: string): IVariableModel<IVariableState> | null;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  id | string | The ID to check for. |

**Returns:**

[IVariableModel](./blockly.ivariablemodel.md)<!-- -->&lt;[IVariableState](./blockly.ivariablestate.md)<!-- -->&gt; \| null

The variable with the given ID.
